alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 7:10PM CDT until April 19 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL COMANCHE...NORTHWESTERN COTTON AND EAST CENTRAL TILLMAN COUNTIES... At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chattanooga, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Cache, Chattanooga, Medicine Park, Faxon, Fort Sill, and Lake Lawtonka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
